amendment.description: Amendment adds the requirement that the Inspector General report on current procedures pertaining to the sharing of information, removal procedures for personal information or information identifying a specific person, and any incidents pertaining to the improper treatment of information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 114-88 to add the requirement that the Inspector General report on current procedures pertaining to the sharing of information, removal procedures for personal information or information identifying a specific person, and any incidents pertaining to the improper treatment of information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carson (IN) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Carson (IN).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carson (IN) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
